alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Idaho and southwestern Clearwater Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 123 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weippe, or 7 miles north of Kamiah, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusting 20 to 30 mph. Brief but heavy rain is expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pierce, Weippe, Musselshell, Cardiff, Jaype, Greer, Pardee and Woodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
